meanings.definition: A person who produces or sells pornographic material.
meanings.sent1: The pornographers were arrested for selling illegal content.
meanings.sent2: The police raided the warehouse where the pornographers stored their films.
meanings.sent3: The town gossip mistakenly thought the librarian was a secret pornographer!
meanings.sent4: The undercover investigator infiltrated the dark world of the pornographers.
meanings.sent5: The documentary exposed the hidden lives of pornographers to the public.

meanings.definition: Those who create or distribute sexually explicit content for profit.
meanings.sent1: Some pornographers operate online websites to sell their videos.
meanings.sent2: The group of pornographers faced legal action for their explicit content.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show featured a hilarious skit about bumbling pornographers.
meanings.sent4: In the competitive industry, pornographers strive to outdo each other in sales.
meanings.sent5: The scandal revealed the luxurious lifestyle of successful pornographers.
